maqras.text: 37|22|bulleo mo-eula malsseum-i iss-euni joeindeulgwa geudeul-ui anaedeulgwa geudeul-i sungbaehaessdeon geosdeul-ila
37|23|hananim oee sungbaehan geosdeul-i la geulihayeo hananim-eun geudeul-eul bul jiog-eulo annaehayeo
37|24|geudeul-eul meomchuge hani geudeul-eun jilmun-eul badge doenola
37|25|neohuiga seolo dobji moshaneun geos eun eojjidoen il-inyo
37|26|geuleohji moshanila geunal geudeul eun simpan-e bogjonghage doenani
37|27|geudeul-eun seolo dagaseomyeo seolo ga seolo-ege jilmunhadeola
37|28|sillo neohuiga oleunpyeon-eulo bu teo uliege wass-eumyeo lago malhani
37|29|anila neohui seuseuloga mid-eum i eobs-eossnola
37|30|ulineun neohuileul daseulil amu leon himdo eobsdoda geugeos-eun ohilyeo neohuiga omanhan baegseongjung-e iss-eossnola
37|31|jinliin junim-ui malsseum-i ibjeung doeeoss-euni ije ulineun uli joee daehan beol-eul bad-aya hal ppun-ila
37|32|sillo ulineun neohuileul banghwangke haess-eumyeo uli seuseulodo banghwanghaessnola
37|33|sillo geudeul moduneun geunal beol-eulbad-eum-e hamkke halila
37|34|hananim-eun ileohdeus joejieun ja leul daseulini
37|35|hananim oee sin-i eobsdaneun malsseum-i geudeul-ege iss-eoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun omanhagon hayeoss-eumyeo
37|36|jejeongsin-i anin siin-eul wiha yeo uliui sindeul-eul pogihaeya doeneu nyo lago geudeul-eun malhaessdeola
37|37|geuleohji anhnola geuneun jinlilo dolaehayeo seonjijadeul-eul hwagjeunghayeossnola
37|38|sillo neohuineun gotongseuleoun beol eul masbol geos-iyo
37|39|neohuiga haenghan geos-eulo daegaleul bad-eulila
37|40|geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jong deul-eun je-uiimyeo
37|41|geudeul-eul wihaeseoneun allyeojin il yonghal yangsig-i iss-euni
37|42|gippeum-ui gwaildeulgwa myeong-yewa jon eom-i geugeos-ila
37|43|geudeul-eun gajang chugbogbad-eun cheongug eseo
37|44|uija-e anj-a seolo majubogo anj-aseo
37|45|heuleuneun saemmul-eseo jan-eulo sunbaeleul deulge doenani
37|46|geugeos-eun sujeong-gat-i hayahgo ma sineun ideul-ege mas-i issdeola
37|47|geugeos-eun meoliga apeuji ani hago chwihajido anhdeola
37|48|geudeul juwieneun sungyeolhan yeoseong deul-i issnani geunyeoui nun-eun jal boho doeeossgo nun-eun keugo aleumdaumae
37|49|machi jal bohobad-eun dalgyalgwa gat deola
37|50|geudeul-eun seolo majubomyeo seolo ga jilmun-eul hani
37|51|geu jung-e han salam-i mal-eul si jaghadeola hyeonseeseo jeoege han chin guga iss-eossneunde
37|52|geuga malhagil dangsin-eun gyesileul midneunja jung-e issneunyo
37|53|uliga jug-eo heulg-idoego ppyeoman namneundedo bosang-gwa beol-eul badneundan mal inyo
37|54|ittae yeoleobun-i naelyeoda bogo sip-eungayo laneun han eumseong-i deullyeowa
37|55|geuga naelyeowa bogo jiog-e issneun geu chinguleul balgyeonhagoseo
37|56|geuga malhagil hananimkke maengse hanani neoneun naleul myeolmang-eulo yuhog halyeo haessnola
37|57|nae junim-ui eunhyega eobs-eossdeondeul sillo naneun geugos-e kkeullyeoon jajung-e iss-eoss-eulila
37|58|uliga jugji anihal geos-ila neun geos-eun geuwa gatji anhneunyo
37|59|uliga hanbeon jug-eumyeon beol-eul badji anihal geos-ila saeng-gaghaessneunyo
37|60|sillo igeos-eun choehuui seunglila
37|61|ileohan geoss-eul wihayeo modeun ingan-eun nolyeoghaeya doenila
37|62|geuwa gat-eun hwandaega deo na-eunyo animyeon jakkumu namuga deo na-eunyo
37|63|hananim-eun joeindeul-eul wihan si heom-eulo geugeos-eul dueossnola
37|64|geugeos-eun buljiog-ui mitbadag-eseo jalaneun namulo
37|65|yeolmaeleul maejneun saessag-eun satan-ui udumeolideulgwa gat-euni
37|66|geudeul-eun geugeos-eul meog-eo baeleul chaeumyeo
37|67|geu wie igeulgeolineun mul-i deo hayeo chaewojigo
37|68|geudeul-eun taoleuneun buljiog-eulo hyanghanila
37|69|geudeul-eun banghwanghaneun geudeul-ui seon jodeul-eul balgyeonhago
37|70|seodulleo geudeul-ui baljachwileul tta lassnola
37|71|geudeul ijeon-ui manh-eun seonjodeuldo banghwanghago iss-eossdeola
37|72|hananim-i geudeul gaunde han seonjijaleul bonaeeo geudeul-eul chung-gohadolog hayeoss-euni
37|73|gyeong-goleul badgodo juuihaji a nihan ideul-ui jongmal-i eotteo haessdeonyo
37|74|geuleona hananim-ui seongsilhan jong deul-eun je-oela
37|75|noaga hananim-ege guwonhaess-eulttae hananim-i geuui gido-e eunghasa
37|76|keun jaeang-eulobuteo geuwa geuuigajog-eul guhago
37|77|geuui jason-eulo hayeogeum saengjon ke hayeossnola
37|78|hananim-eun hue eul sedaedeul-eul wihae geuege chugbog-eul namgyeo
37|79|husedae gaunde noa-ege pyeong an-i issdolog hayeossnola
37|80|icheoleom hananim-eun seon-eul haengha neun jadeul-ege bosanghanani
37|81|hananim-ui chungsilhan han jong-ieoss nola
37|82|geuligo hananim-eun bulsinhan na meojileul igsake hayeossnola
